title: SMC_ArticulatedRobot_6DOF_J4_State (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_ArticulatedRobot_6DOF_J4_State :
The possible configuration states of joint 4 of the 6DOF robot arm.

rows.Name: SMC_AR_HANDDOWN
rows.Comment: The hand is pointing âdownâ, i.e. q4 > 0

rows.Name: SMC_AR_HANDUP
rows.Comment: The hand is pointing âupâ, i.e. q4 < 0

rows.Name: SMC_AR_HANDSTRAIGHT
rows.Comment: The hand is straight (q4 ~ 0), singular case
